definition: Gao Yun (died 409) emperor of Northern or Later Yan dynasty
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: High clouds are much colder than low clouds and the surface. They radiate less energy to space than low clouds do.
sentences.chinese: 高云的温度远比低云和地表要低，失去的能量也更少。

sentences.english: The autumn wind is cool, "ice city"Harbin has a clear sky and pleasant temperature.
sentences.chinese: 秋风送爽，冰城哈尔滨天高云淡，温度宜人。

sentences.english: In the morning of the second day, high clouds covered the sky.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛第二天上午，天空密布高云。

sentences.english: Because high clouds absorb energy so efficiently, they have the potential to raise global temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 因为能有效的吸收能量，高云有可能使全球气温升高。

sentences.english: Autumn to vegetation Xiao Shu, open thin clouds.
sentences.chinese: 秋来草木萧疏，开高云淡。

sentences.english: Pillars are caused by ice crystals floating in high clouds.
sentences.chinese: 光柱的形成是由于漂浮在高云的冰晶。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
sunshine/to shine upon/variant of 輝|辉[hui1]
Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
Zhangyang county in Zhumadian 駐馬店|驻马店[Zhu4 ma3 dian4], Henan
to promote (to official position in former times)
